description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Drive across the USA! This is YOUR spring break. Visit bars, clubs and more on your way to babe nirvana. Interact with the locals! You will need cash of course! The full version includes online play, ability to steal vehicles, enter buildings, rob stores, and new weapons, including a flamethrower!  Oh, and watch out for cannibals! This is the ultimate blend of action and driving!
